name: Hullbreakers
description:
W - Upgrade


Upgrading your ship resets its HP, as well as teleports towards your crosshair up to a maximum range.
Each time you upgrade back to the original ship, your gain a permanent damage buff.

Shift - Dash


Dashes towards your crosshair. Useful for repositioning.

ESC - To pause and/or quit.

DISCLAIMER

This is a FREE game made by students at the University of Houston as a project for the class Intro to Game Development. NOT a professional game created for-profit. If you enjoy Hullbreakers, I highly recommend you play the game it was inspired and designed from: Nova Drift.
